cjdelisle - (17:38): magnet:?xt=urn:btih:740ff9e1a562f588362468ce22285b1b1a3c94d3&dn=xwiki.gitClone.7z  
cjdelisle - (17:39): That's it, 550MB the whole history.  
lucaa - (17:48): gang, I'm working on http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XE-720  
lucaa - (17:48): wdyt about the issues discussed in my last comment for it?  
cjdelisle - (17:51): +1 tagcloud   (the easy one ;) )  
lucaa - (17:53): how about the parameters?  
cjdelisle - (17:54): Not sure I understand, space=<some space in the wiki?>  
cjdelisle - (17:55): intuitively, scope=(wiki|space)  space=<nameOfASpace>  
lucaa - (18:00): yes, space should be a name of a space  
cjdelisle - (18:00): It sounds right to me for what it's worth.  
lucaa - (18:01): and for scope, the idea is that we might need to say: scope="wiki|space|currentSpace"  
cjdelisle - (18:01): why currentSpace?  
lucaa - (18:02): I know that normally it should be very easy to specify current space with a little bit of scripting  
lucaa - (18:02): but  
cjdelisle - (18:02): I would think scope=space space=undefined and it should guess you want the current space.  
lucaa - (18:02): yes, actually, that's a solution  
cjdelisle - (18:03): No complaints from me then.  
lucaa - (18:03): however, the tagcloud on the Main.Dashboard has a very interesting behaviour atm  
lucaa - (18:03): it displays tags from current space, except for the case when the current space is main  
lucaa - (18:03): when it displays tags from the whole wiki  
lucaa - (18:04): this would be a type of "scope" we might need to specify  
cjdelisle - (18:04): Hehe I can just imagine the thought that when into writing that.  
lucaa - (18:04): it's very simple actually  
lucaa - (18:05): it makes the Main.Dashboard very versatile, usable on a space homepage as well as on the "global" homepage, Main.WebHome  
lucaa - (18:05): anyway, for scopes we could have whatever we want  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 18:06  
lucaa - (18:06): there is a pb with 2 params  
lucaa - (18:07): namely the case when scope says wiki and the parameter space says the name of a space  
cjdelisle - (18:07): scope=wiki is explicit so I would defer to that.  
cjdelisle - (18:09): sdumitriu, I have the whole git repo if you want it.  
sdumitriu - (18:09): Hi cjdelisle  
sdumitriu - (18:09): What does "git branch -r" say?  
cjdelisle - (18:10): just git-svn  
cjdelisle - (18:10): It's the whole thing from the root. A nice history but the branches aren't integrated.  
sdumitriu - (18:10): How big is the .git directory?  
cjdelisle - (18:11): I 7ziped it and it's 500MB  
sdumitriu - (18:11): Hm, pretty big  
cjdelisle - (18:11): magnet:?xt=urn:btih:740ff9e1a562f588362468ce22285b1b1a3c94d3&dn=xwiki.gitClone.7z  
cjdelisle - (18:12): Push speed out here is not that great but it'll work.

sburjan` - (19:44): Ubuntu 1-.10 got final today :)  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 19:45  
lucaa - (19:56): sburjan`: huh? already?  
lucaa - (19:56): what does final mean? it's out? we can upgrade?  
lucaa - (19:57): ah, it IS out  
lucaa - (19:57): mmh  
lucaa - (19:57): surprisingly early  
lucaa - (19:57): (maybe to celebrate the day, 10.10 released on 10.10.10)  
abusenius - (20:05): btw 101010 (bin) = 42 (dec) :)  
lucaa - (20:07): yeah, I noticed it  
lucaa - (20:08): maybe this ubuntu will be the answer to everything...  
lucaa - (20:08): ;)  
lucaa - (20:08): (pulseaudio included)  
lucaa - (20:16): guys, I have closed XATAG-41 . Should I also replace the includes of XWiki.TagCloud with calls to the macro?  
lucaa - (20:16): for 2.5RC1 I mean  
lucaa - (20:16): would it be ok that we release the RC1 with a different version of the tags application than the M2?  
lucaa - (20:16): vmassol, sdumitriu wdyt?  
sdumitriu - (20:17): Yes  
lucaa - (20:17): it's just this change in XATAGS 1.14 , so no side-effects  
lucaa - (20:17): theoretically  
lucaa - (20:27): ok, I'll commit it then
